mapper.select: SELECT * FROM contents c WHERE c.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM contents c WHERE c.contents_type = #{type}
SELECT c.* FROM contents c RIGHT JOIN courses ci ON ci.contents_id = c.id WHERE ci.id = #{id}

SELECT c.* FROM contents c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cs.* FROM contents cs RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT ci.* FROM courses_index ci WHERE ci.courses_id = 1 ) cix ON cix.contents_id = cs.id) csc ON csc.top_id = c.top_id OR c.id = csc.top_id WHERE c.contents_type = 'courses_contents';
SELECT c.* FROM contents c WHERE c.top_id = #{id} OR c.id = #{id} AND c.contents_type = #{type}
SELECT c.* FROM contents c WHERE c.parent_id = #{id} AND c.contents_type = #{type}

choose.when: INSERT INTO contents(name, description, parent_id, path, contents_type, top_id, is_top) VALUE (#{name}, #{description}, #{parentId}, #{path}, #{contentsType}, #{topId}, #{isTop})
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO contents(name, description, parent_id, path, contents_type) VALUE (#{name}, #{description}, #{parentId}, #{path}, #{contentsType})

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM contents u WHERE u.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE contents SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, parent_d = #{parentId}, path = #{path}
